atk-s0403a:836_2: so catupārisuddhisīlaṃ hoti. Iti imasmiṃ sutte ekādasasu ṭhānesu arahattaṃ pakkhipitvā
atk-s0403a:838_0: 68. Catutthe kālaṃ jānātīti yuttappattakālaṃ jānāti. Ayaṃ kālo uddesassāti ayaṃ buddhavacanaṃ
atk-s0403a:838_1: uggaṇhanakālo. Paripucchāyāti atthānatthaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ paripucchāya. Yogassāti
atk-s0403a:838_2: yoge kammaṃ pakkhipanassa. Paṭisallānassāti nilīyanassa ekībhāvassa. Dhammānudhammappaṭipannoti
atk-s0403a:838_3: navannaṃ lokuttaradhammānaṃ anurūpadhammaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno. Evaṃ kho,
atk-s0403a:838_4: bhikkhave, bhikkhu puggalaparoparaññū hotīti evaṃ bhikkhu puggalānaṃ paroparaṃ tikkhamudubhāvaṃ
atk-s0403a:840_0: 69. Pañcame pannapalāsoti patitapalāso. Jālakajātoti sañjātapattapupphajālo. Tassa
atk-s0403a:840_1: hi pattajālañca pupphajālañca saheva nikkhamati. Khārakajātoti pāṭiyekkaṃ sañjātena
atk-s0403a:840_2: suvibhattena pattajālakena ca pupphajālakena ca samannāgato. Kuṭumalakajātoti sañjātamakuḷo.
atk-s0403a:840_3: Korakajātoti avikasitehi mahākucchīhi sambhinnamukhehi pupphehi samannāgato. Sabbapāliphulloti
atk-s0403a:840_4: sabbākārena supupphito. Dibbe cattāro māseti dibbena āyunā cattāro māse. Manussagaṇanāya
atk-s0403a:840_5: pana tāni dvādasa vassasahassāni honti. Paricārentīti ito cito ca indriyāni cārenti,
atk-s0403a:841_0: Ābhāya phuṭaṃ hotīti tattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ obhāsena phuṭaṃ hoti. Tesañhi pupphānaṃ bālasūriyassa
atk-s0403a:841_1: viya ābhā hoti, pattāni paṇṇacchattappamāṇāni, anto mahātumbamattā reṇu hoti. Pupphite
atk-s0403a:841_2: pana pāricchattake ārohanakiccaṃ vā aṅkusakaṃ gahetvā namanakiccaṃ vā pupphāharaṇatthaṃ
atk-s0403a:841_3: caṅgoṭakakiccaṃ vā natthi, kantanakavāto uṭṭhahitvā pupphāni vaṇṭato kantati, sampaṭicchanakavāto
atk-s0403a:841_4: sampaṭicchati, pavesanakavāto sudhammaṃ devasabhaṃ paveseti, sammajjanakavāto purāṇapupphāni
atk-s0403a:841_5: nīharati, santharaṇakavāto pattakaṇṇikakesarāni rañjento santharati. Majjhaṭṭhāne
atk-s0403a:841_6: dhammāsanaṃ hoti yojanappamāṇo ratanapallaṅko upari tiyojanena setacchattena dhāriyamānena,
atk-s0403a:841_7: tadanantaraṃ sakkassa devarañño āsanaṃ atthariyati, tato tettiṃsāya devaputtānaṃ,
atk-s0403a:841_8: tato aññesaṃ mahesakkhānaṃ devānaṃ, aññataradevatānaṃ pupphakaṇṇikāva āsanaṃ hoti.
atk-s0403a:841_9: Devā devasabhaṃ pavisitvā nisīdanti. Tato pupphehi reṇuvaṭṭi uggantvā uparikaṇṇikaṃ
atk-s0403a:841_10: āhacca nipatamānā devatānaṃ tigāvutappamāṇaṃ attabhāvaṃ lākhārasaparikammasajjitaṃ
atk-s0403a:841_11: viya suvaṇṇacuṇṇapiñjaraṃ viya karoti. Ekacce devā ekekaṃ pupphaṃ gahetvā aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0403a:841_12: paharantāpi kīḷantiyeva. Paharaṇakālepi mahātumbappamāṇā reṇu nikkhamitvā sarīraṃ
atk-s0403a:841_13: pabhāsampannehi gandhacuṇṇehi sañjatamanosilārāgaṃ viya karoti. Evaṃ sā kīḷā catūhi
atk-s0403a:841_14: māsehi pariyosānaṃ gacchati. Ayamānubhāvoti ayaṃ anupharituṃ ānubhāvo.
atk-s0403a:842_0: Idāni yasmā na satthā pāricchattakena atthiko, tena pana saddhiṃ upametvā satta ariyasāvake
atk-s0403a:842_1: dassetukāmo, tasmā te dassetuṃ evameva khotiādimāha. Tattha pabbajjāya cetetīti pabbajissāmīti
atk-s0403a:842_2: cinteti. Devānaṃvāti devānaṃ viya. Yāva brahmalokā saddo abbhuggacchatīti pathavitalato
atk-s0403a:842_3: yāva brahmalokā sādhukārasaddena sabbaṃ ekasaddameva hoti. Ayamānubhāvoti ayaṃ khīṇāsavassa
atk-s0403a:842_4: bhikkhuno anupharaṇānubhāvo. Imasmiṃ sutte catupārisuddhisīlaṃ pabbajjānissitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0403a:842_5: kasiṇaparikammaṃ paṭhamajjhānasannissitaṃ, vipassanāya saddhiṃ tayo maggā tīṇi ca
atk-s0403a:842_6: phalāni arahattamaggasannissitāni honti. Desanāya heṭṭhato vā uparito vā ubhayato
atk-s0403a:842_7: vā paricchedo hoti, idha pana ubhayato paricchedo. Tenetaṃ vuttaṃ. Saṅkhepato panettha
atk-s0403a:844: 70. Chaṭṭhe parisuddhā ca bhavissantīti bhiyyosomattāya parisuddhā bhavissanti nimmalā. Sakammāragatoti ettha sa-kāro nipātamattaṃ, kammāragato kammāruddhanagatoti attho.
atk-s0403a:846_0: 71. Sattame ananuyuttassāti na yuttappayuttassa hutvā viharato. Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave,
atk-s0403a:846_1: kukkuṭiyā aṇḍānīti imā kaṇhapakkhasukkapakkhavasena dve upamā vuttā. Tāsu kaṇhapakkhūpamā
atk-s0403a:846_2: atthassa asādhikā, itarā sādhikāti sukkapakkhūpamāya eva attho veditabbo. Seyyathāti
atk-s0403a:846_3: opammatthe nipāto. Apīti sambhāvanatthe. Ubhayenāpi seyyathāpi nāma, bhikkhaveti
atk-s0403a:846_4: dasseti. Kukkuṭiyā aṇḍāni aṭṭha vā dasa vā dvādasa vāti ettha pana kiñcāpi kukkuṭiyā
atk-s0403a:846_5: vuttappakārato ūnādhikānipi aṇḍāni honti, vacanasiliṭṭhatāya panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Evañhi
atk-s0403a:846_6: loke siliṭṭhaṃ vacanaṃ hoti. Tānassūti tāni assu, bhaveyyunti attho. Kukkuṭiyā sammā
atk-s0403a:846_7: adhisayitānīti tāya janettiyā kukkuṭiyā pakkhe pasāretvā tesaṃ upari sayantiyā sammā
atk-s0403a:846_8: adhisayitāni. Sammā pariseditānīti kālena kālaṃ utuṃ gaṇhāpentiyā suṭṭhu samantato
atk-s0403a:846_9: seditāni, usmīkatānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sammā paribhāvitānīti kālena kālaṃ suṭṭhu samantato
atk-s0403a:847_0: Kiñcāpi tassā kukkuṭiyāti tassā kukkuṭiyā imaṃ tividhakiriyākaraṇena appamādaṃ katvā
atk-s0403a:847_1: kiñcāpi na evaṃ icchā uppajjeyya. Atha kho bhabbāva teti atha kho te kukkuṭapotakā
atk-s0403a:847_2: vuttanayena sotthinā abhinibbhijjituṃ bhabbāva. Te hi yasmā tāya kukkuṭiyā evaṃ tīhākārehi
atk-s0403a:847_3: tāni aṇḍāni paripāliyamānāni na pūtīni honti. Yopi nesaṃ allasineho, so pariyādānaṃ
atk-s0403a:847_4: gacchati, kapālaṃ tanukaṃ hoti, pādanakhasikhā ca mukhatuṇḍakañca kharaṃ hoti, sayampi
atk-s0403a:847_5: pariṇāmaṃ gacchati. Kapālassa tanuttā bahiddhā āloko anto paññāyati, tasmā “ciraṃ
atk-s0403a:847_6: vata mayaṃ saṃkuṭitahatthapādā sambādhe sayimha, ayañca bahi āloko dissati, ettha
atk-s0403a:847_7: dāni no sukhavihāro bhavissatī”ti nikkhamitukāmā hutvā kapālaṃ pādena paharanti,
atk-s0403a:847_8: gīvaṃ pasārenti, tato taṃ kapālaṃ dvedhā bhijjati. Atha te pakkhe vidhunantā taṃkhaṇānurūpaṃ
atk-s0403a:847_9: viravantā nikkhamantiyeva. Nikkhamantā ca gāmakkhettaṃ upasobhayamānā vicaranti.
atk-s0403a:848_0: Evameva khoti idaṃ opammasampaṭipādanaṃ. Taṃ evaṃ atthena saṃsandetvā veditabbaṃ
atk-s0403a:848_1: – tassā kukkuṭiyā aṇḍesu adhisayanāditividhakiriyākaraṇaṃ viya hi imassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0403a:848_2: bhāvanaṃ anuyuttakālo, kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyāsampādanena aṇḍānaṃ apūtibhāvo viya
atk-s0403a:848_3: bhāvanaṃ anuyuttassa bhikkhuno tividhānupassanāsampādanena vipassanāñāṇassa aparihāni.
atk-s0403a:848_4: Tassā tividhakiriyākaraṇena aṇḍānaṃ allasinehapariyādānaṃ viya tassa bhikkhuno tividhānupassanāsampādanena
atk-s0403a:848_6: avijjaṇḍakosassa tanubhāvo, kukkuṭapotakānaṃ nakhatuṇḍakānaṃ thaddhabhāvo viya bhikkhuno
atk-s0403a:848_8: bhikkhuno vipassanāñāṇassa pariṇāmakālo vaḍḍhikālo gabbhaggahaṇakālo, kukkuṭapotakānaṃ
atk-s0403a:848_9: pādanakhasikhāya vā mukhatuṇḍakena vā aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā pakkhe papphoṭetvā sotthinā
atk-s0403a:848_10: abhinibbhidākālo viya tassa bhikkhuno vipassanāñāṇagabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā vicarantassa
atk-s0403a:848_11: tajjātikaṃ utusappāyaṃ vā bhojanasappāyaṃ vā puggalasappāyaṃ vā dhammassavanasappāyaṃ
atk-s0403a:848_12: vā labhitvā ekāsane nisinnasseva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhentassa anupubbādhigatena arahattamaggena
atk-s0403a:848_13: avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā abhiññāpakkhe papphoṭetvā sotthinā arahattappattakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0403a:849: Yathā pana kukkuṭapotakānaṃ pariṇatabhāvaṃ ñatvā mātāpi aṇḍakosaṃ bhindati, evaṃ tathārūpassa bhikkhuno ñāṇaparipākaṃ ñatvā satthāpi –
atk-s0403a:852_0: Ādinā nayena obhāsaṃ pharitvā gāthāya avijjaṇḍakosaṃ paharati. So gāthāpariyosāne
atk-s0403a:852_1: avijjaṇḍakosaṃ bhinditvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Tato paṭṭhāya yathā te kukkuṭapotakā
atk-s0403a:852_2: gāmakkhettaṃ upasobhayamānā tattha vicaranti, evaṃ ayampi mahākhīṇāsavo nibbānārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0403a:853_0: Phalagaṇḍassāti vaḍḍhakissa. So hi olambakasaṅkhātaṃ phalaṃ cāretvā dārūnaṃ gaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0403a:853_1: haratīti phalagaṇḍoti vuccati. Vāsijaṭeti vāsidaṇḍakassa gahaṇaṭṭhāne. Ettakaṃ me
atk-s0403a:853_2: ajja āsavānaṃ khīṇanti pabbajitassa hi pabbajjāsaṅkhepena uddesena paripucchāya yonisomanasikārena
atk-s0403a:853_3: vattapaṭipattiyā ca niccakālaṃ āsavā khīyanti. Evaṃ khīyamānānaṃ pana nesaṃ “ettakaṃ
atk-s0403a:853_4: ajja khīṇaṃ ettakaṃ hiyyo”ti evamassa ñāṇaṃ na hotīti attho. Imāya upamāya vipassanānisaṃso dīpito.
atk-s0403a:854_0: Hemantikenāti hemantasamayena. Paṭippassambhantīti thirabhāvena parihāyanti. Evameva
atk-s0403a:854_1: khoti ettha mahāsamuddo viya sāsanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, nāvā viya yogāvacaro, nāvāya mahāsamudde
atk-s0403a:854_2: pariyāyanaṃ viya imassa bhikkhuno ūnapañcavassakāle ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ santike vicaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0403a:854_3: nāvāya mahāsamuddaudakena khajjamānānaṃ bandhanānaṃ tanubhāvo viya bhikkhuno pabbajjāsaṅkhepena
atk-s0403a:854_4: uddesaparipucchādīhiyeva saṃyojanānaṃ tanubhāvo, nāvāya thale ukkhittakālo viya bhikkhuno
atk-s0403a:854_5: nissayamuttakassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe vasanakālo, divā vātātapena saṃsussanaṃ
atk-s0403a:854_6: viya vipassanāñāṇena taṇhāsinehassa saṃsussanaṃ, rattiṃ himodakena temanaṃ viya kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0403a:854_7: nissāya uppannena pītipāmojjena cittatemanaṃ, rattindivaṃ vātātapehi ceva himodakena
atk-s0403a:854_8: ca parisukkhaparitintānaṃ bandhanānaṃ dubbalabhāvo viya vipassanāñāṇapītipāmojjehi
atk-s0403a:854_9: saṃyojanānaṃ bhiyyosomattāya dubbalabhāvo, pāvussakamegho viya arahattamaggañāṇaṃ,
atk-s0403a:854_10: meghavuṭṭhiudakena nāvāya antopūtibhāvo viya āraddhavipassakassa rūpasattakādivasena
atk-s0403a:854_11: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhentassa okkhāyamāne pakkhāyamāne kammaṭṭhāne ekadivasaṃ utusappāyādīni
atk-s0403a:854_12: laddhā ekapallaṅkena nisinnassa arahattaphalādhigamo. Pūtibandhanāya nāvāya kiñci
atk-s0403a:854_13: kālaṃ ṭhānaṃ viya khīṇasaṃyojanassa arahato mahājanaṃ anuggaṇhantassa yāvatāyukaṃ
atk-s0403a:854_14: ṭhānaṃ, pūtibandhanāya nāvāya anupubbena bhijjitvā apaṇṇattikabhāvūpagamo viya khīṇāsavassa
atk-s0403a:856_0: 72. Aṭṭhamaṃ atthuppattiyaṃ kathitaṃ. Atthuppatti panassa heṭṭhā cūḷaccharāsaṅghātasuttavaṇṇanāya
atk-s0403a:856_1: vitthāritā eva. Passatha noti passatha nu. Āliṅgitvāti upagūhitvā. Upanisīdeyyāti
atk-s0403a:856_2: samīpe nissāya nisīdeyya. Upanipajjeyyāti upagantvā nipajjeyya. Ārocayāmīti ācikkhāmi.
atk-s0403a:856_3: Paṭivedayāmīti paṭivedetvā jānāpetvā kathemi. Vālarajjuyāti assavālagovālehi vaṭṭitarajjuyā.
atk-s0403a:856_4: Paccorasminti uramajjhe. Pheṇuddehakanti pheṇaṃ uddehitvā, ussādetvāti attho. Attatthanti
atk-s0403a:856_6: nayo. Sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ cūḷaccharāsaṅghātasuttassa atthuppattiyaṃ
atk-s0403a:856_7: kathitameva. Idañca pana suttaṃ kathetvā satthā cūḷaccharāsaṅghātasuttaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0403a:858_0: 74. Dasame parittanti appaṃ thokaṃ. Tañhi sarasaparittatāyapi khaṇaparittatāyapi
atk-s0403a:858_1: ṭhitiparittatāyapi parittameva. Lahuṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhanato lahukaṃ. Mantāyaṃ boddhabbanti
atk-s0403a:858_2: mantāya boddhabbaṃ, paññāya jānitabbanti attho. Pabbateyyāti pabbatasambhavā. Hārahārinīti
atk-s0403a:858_3: rukkhanaḷaveḷuādīni haritabbāni harituṃ samatthā. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0403a:860: 75. Aṭṭhamassa paṭhame āpattiṃ jānātīti āpattiṃyeva āpattīti jānāti. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0403a:862_0: 76. Dutiye svāgatānīti suāgatāni suppaguṇāni. Suvibhattānīti koṭṭhāsato suṭṭhu vibhattāni.
atk-s0403a:862_1: Suppavattīnīti āvajjitāvajjitaṭṭhāne suṭṭhu pavattāni daḷhappaguṇāni. Suvinicchitānīti
atk-s0403a:862_2: suṭṭhu vinicchitāni. Suttasoti vibhaṅgato. Anubyañjanasoti khandhakaparivārato.
atk-s0403a:864: 77. Tatiye vinaye kho pana ṭhito hotīti vinayalakkhaṇe patiṭṭhito hoti. Asaṃhīroti na sakkā hoti gahitaggahaṇaṃ vissajjāpetuṃ.
atk-s0403a:866_0: 83. Navame ekoti adutiyo. Vūpakaṭṭhoti kāyena gaṇato, cittena kilesehi vūpakaṭṭho
atk-s0403a:866_1: vivekaṭṭho dūrībhūto. Appamattoti satiavippavāse ṭhito. Pahitattoti pesitatto. Nibbidāyāti
atk-s0403a:866_2: vaṭṭe ukkaṇṭhanatthāya. Virāgāyāti rāgādīnaṃ virajjanatthāya. Nirodhāyāti appavattikaraṇatthāya.
atk-s0403a:866_3: Vūpasamāyāti kilesavūpasamāya appavattiyā. Abhiññāyāti tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā abhijānanatthāya.
atk-s0403a:866_4: Sambodhāyāti maggasaṅkhātassa sambodhassa atthāya. Nibbānāyāti nibbānassa sacchikaraṇatthāya.
atk-s0403a:868_0: 84. Dasame adhikaraṇāni samenti vūpasamentīti adhikaraṇasamathā. Uppannuppannānanti
atk-s0403a:868_1: uppannānaṃ uppannānaṃ. Adhikaraṇānanti vivādādhikaraṇaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ
atk-s0403a:868_2: kiccādhikaraṇanti imesaṃ catunnaṃ. Samathāya vūpasamāyāti samathatthañceva vūpasamanatthañca.
atk-s0403a:868_3: Sammukhāvinayo dātabbo…pe… tiṇavatthārakoti ime satta samathā dātabbā. Tesaṃ vinicchayo
atk-s0403a:868_4: vinayasaṃvaṇṇanato gahetabbo. Apica dīghanikāye saṅgītisuttavaṇṇanāyampi vitthāritoyeva,
atk-s0403a:869: Ito parāni satta suttāni uttānatthāneva. Na hettha kiñci heṭṭhā avuttanayaṃ nāma atthīti.
